name: Anchor Girl Take Home
description:
Gameplay:

You play a part-time worker, earn money through regular work and investment, and then reward the female anchor in the live broadcast room. When you reach a certain degree of favorability, the female anchor will give you various benefits. Players should also pay attention to their stress value while working. When the stress value is too high, the protagonist will be overwhelmed and choose to leave this world. Players can take a walk in the park or fight crickets and rest at home to reduce a small amount of stress. Watching the live broadcast at the end can also reduce a lot of stress! Do a good job in time management, or manipulate the stock market in the fund system, make enough money, give gifts to female anchors, and gain the hearts of female anchors.

Game Features:

You can become the big brother of the female anchor, choose the anchor you like, and then become her close friend!

Fund System:

In addition to working in our game, you can invest in a simplified fund system. You need to carry out reasonable operations according to the events in the game, and reproduce the feat of winning from 20 yuan to 37 million!

Game Role:

  • Xiaohui: I used to be a bank intern, but because I owed a lot of money, I started to do part-time live broadcasts. Finally, I became a full-time anchor because the money came from live broadcasts too quickly. I am an OL and like to wear uniforms.

Go on a date with a female anchor! ! !
